title: WORLD'S BEST CAT LITTER Poop Fighter Maximum Odor Defense, 15-Pounds - Natural Ingredients, Quick Clumping, Flushable, 99% Dust Free & Made in USA - Long-Lasting Odor Control & Easy Scooping
description: World’s Best Cat Litter® Poop Fighter™ Maximum Odor Defense is the first natural and sustainable cat litter designed to eliminate poop stink, not just mask it.  This naturally safe multiple cat formula with dual-action Botanical Blocker™ immediately neutralizes poop & urine odors, leaving only a light lemongrass scent.
